sources.name: SequentialFile0
sources.script:
source(output(
		state_name as string,
		state_code as string,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SequentialFile0

sources.name: SequentialFile1
sources.script:
source(output(
		state_name as string,
		state_code as string,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SequentialFile1

transformations.name: Lookup6
transformations.script:
Filter4, SequentialFile1 lookup(SequentialFile0@state_code == SequentialFile1@state_code,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup6

transformations.name: Aggregator9
transformations.script:
Lookup6 aggregate(groupBy(bnk_name,
		state_name = state_name),
	city = count(city)) ~> Aggregator9
